mapper.select: SELECT user_email as "userEmail", family_name as "familyName", last_name as "lastName", phone_number1 as "phoneNumber1", phone_number2 as "phoneNumber2", phone_number3 as "phoneNumber2", reported_count as "reportedCount", freeze_flag as "freezeFlag", date_of_dormant_start as "dateOfDormantStart", date_of_dormant_end as "dateOfDormantEnd", date_of_membership_start as "dateOfMembershipStart", date_of_membership_end as "dateOfMembershipEnd", type_of_membership as "typeOfMembership" FROM assetcoach.user where assetcoach.user.user_email = #{userEmail} and assetcoach.user.password = #{userPassword}
